mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents) values (#{boardWriter}, #{boardPass}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents})
mapper.select: select id, boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents, boardCreatedTime, boardHits, fileAttached from board_table order by id desc
select id, boardWriter, boardPass, boardTitle, boardContents, boardCreatedTime, boardHits, fileAttached from board_table where id = ${id};
mapper.update: update board_table set boardHits = boardHits + 1 where id = ${id};
